title: I can rap, sing, and dance. I’m fit by Korean beauty standards, but I'm an Indian. Will JYP, YG, or other entertainment companies accept me? - Quora

response.answer_text: The matter is you know to do everything but visuals and personality matters most !! You think company searches for talent but once you make a debut you'll receive hate from people who are biased on visuals !! And if you are confident enough and I suggest you to go for jyp because I'm just 14 and I'm trying to audition there and I'm an Indian too but my parents aren't allowing me !! Hope you achieve your dreams ! There are 92% chance if you are confident in your talent and visuals 💜
